name: RandomActofKindness
0:
”Alexa, ask Random Act of Kindness for an idea”
”Alexa, ask Random Act of Kindness for inspiration”
”Alexa, open Random Act of Kindness”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random act of kindness
des:
You will never change your life until you change something you do daily. Build kindness into your daily routine. These simple acts were chosen, because they can easily be done by anyone.

Be more mindful of your daily interactions. Spread little sparks of happiness throughout your day. Find your Random Act of Kindness.

Just ask Alexa for a Random Act of Kindness.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
